item.title: 2016 TV News Story
item.dc:creator: Anna
item.description:
Lancaster, PA’s WGAL News 8 story about Kwee-Jack Fish Co. introduces you to the fishermen, provides a glimpse of commercial salmon fishing in Alaska, and shows the space a 20 pound salmon share takes in a standard freezer.

The post 2016 TV News Story appeared first on Kwee-Jack Fish Co..

item.title: Kwee-Jack Fish Co.’s Favorite Recipes (Part 1)Love your tummy, eat more salmon!
item.dc:creator: Angela
item.description:
Grilled Salmon with Avocado Salsa We love easy, delicious recipes here at Kwee-Jack Fish Co. We also love healthy ways of cooking up one of the healthiest proteins on the planet. So we were so pleased to find this great grilling recipe that incorporated the fresh flavors of avocado and lime. Prep Time: 45 minutes…

item.title: Co-op offers wild salmon | AltoonaMirror.com | Altoona, PA
item.dc:creator: Noah
item.description:
Local residents can now enjoy wild Alaskan salmon. Billings, Mont.,-based Kwee-Jack Fish Co. has opened its Altoona co-op at the Alpacas of the Alleghenies Farm, near Duncansville. The business was started by Joe Echo-Hawk, who was born in Fairbanks, Alaska, and is now a commercial airline pilot living in Montana. He has spent 13 summers…

Read More →

The post Co-op offers wild salmon | AltoonaMirror.com | Altoona, PA appeared first on Kwee-Jack Fish Co..

item.title: Benefits of Eating Wild Alaskan Sockeye SalmonHeart-healthy, immune-boosting awesomeness.
item.dc:creator: Angela
item.description:
No added chemicals No artificial coloring No preservatives No pesticides No growth hormones No antibiotics No GMOs Fish Oil Omega 3s It is well established that eating fish regularly helps protect against developing heart disease and heart attack. The oils in fish are unique; they have omega 3s–fatty acids not found in any other foods.…

item.title: Wild vs. Farm Raised Salmon
item.dc:creator: Angela
item.description:
Wild vs. Farmed Raised Salmon With all the media hype about getting more Omega 3’s, consumers have been advised that fish could be a good source of these helpful fats. What are Omega 3’s? Well, they are unsaturated fats that have anti-inflammatory properties. This is important because inflammation in our bodies has been shown to contribute…

Read More →

The post Wild vs. Farm Raised Salmon appeared first on Kwee-Jack Fish Co..
